title: KnoxDao
desc: Sole developer for the Knoxers project, Nextjs Typescript for Frontend, and Solidity for smart contract.

title: Aleph x Standard Chartered
desc: Converting existing S2B platform from EmberJS to ReactJS, converting RESTful API to GraphQL.
linkTitle: Online banking platform for business transactions

title: Aleph-Soul
desc: Developed the ERC721 smart contract for Aleph-Soul project.   Ensuring front-end is able to interact with the deployed Smart Contract on Polygon.

title: Aleph NFT Challenge
desc: Winner of the very first NFT Challenge in Aleph. Won this challenge by creating an entire working NFT collections deployed on Rinkeby Network with a ERC721 smart contract, with a front-end, allowing users to mint with metamask and view minted NFT on opensea.

title: Portfolio V1
desc: My very first portfolio done in 2020.
